about_the_game:
As Victoria, you've come to check in on your elderly mentor, Professor Henry Zubringer, who has nobody to check on him during a bad storm in the city of Corburgh. The professor was always protective of his research, never letting you learn much about it as you assisted him. But it turned out that what he was studying was much closer to home, and much more dangerous, than he had ever let on. And now it sees you. It wants you to see it.

Gameplay

Casting Whispers is a first person horror game where you will need to use both sight and sound to keep yourself safe and further your investigation. You will need to close your eyes in-game to listen for clues in the environment, and keep a wary eye open for small changes in your environment. Things are not as they may seem.

Key Features

  • Highly atmospheric investigation in a dangerous place.
    Use more than sight to navigate your environment.
  • Cosmic horror.
    The thing in the building is not of our world. Its motivations are unclear. It no more comprehends you than you comprehend it.

short_description: Casting Whispers is a story-driven first-person horror mystery in the fictional New England industrial city of Corburgh. Investigate the run-down apartment building that your mentor seems to have vanished in, while an alien interdimensional being vies for your attention and, possibly, your life.
